metadata.title: CVE-2019-16089 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.2.13. nbd_genl_statusin drivers/block/nbd.c does not check the nla_nest_start_noflag returnvalue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16089` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-42-generic - 5.4.0-42.46
linux-image-5.4.0-42-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-42.46
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-42-generic - 5.4.0-42.46
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-42-lowlatency - 5.4.0-42.46
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1020-kvm - 5.4.0-1020.20
No subscription required

No subscription required
